item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, January 26, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: DeepSeek My User Agent (93 points | 36 comments)
2. The leading AI models are now good historians (63 points | 24 comments)
3. Brazil bans Sam Altman's tech firm Tools for Humanity from paying for iris scans (100 points | 17 comments)
4. Show HN: 3D printing giant things with a Python jigsaw generator (14 points | discuss)
5. Qwen2.5-1M: Deploy your own Qwen with context length up to 1M tokens (82 points | 52 comments)
6. Amsterdam Compiler Kit for Cray X-MP (30 points | 1 comment)
7. Hyperbound (YC S23) Is Hiring Founding Full-Cycle AES in SF ( | hide)
8. Hard numbers in the Wayland vs. X11 input latency discussion (325 points | 202 comments)
9. Astronomers delete asteroid because it turned out to be Tesla Roadster (66 points | 10 comments)
10. So you wanna write Kubernetes controllers? (77 points | 38 comments)
11. Quiet Quitting: Why Employees Are Demanding Fairness and Boundaries (44 points | 29 comments)
12. The protester's guide to smartphone security (222 points | 110 comments)
13. Using the most unhinged AVX-512 instruction to make fastest phrase search algo (67 points | 16 comments)
14. Another undersea cable damaged in Baltic Sea (104 points | 76 comments)
15. Astronomers seek global ban on space advertising (26 points | 3 comments)
16. No one is disrupting banks – at least not the big ones (65 points | 92 comments)
17. Reviving a Dead Audio Format: The Return of ZZM (68 points | 5 comments)
18. The Microsoft 365 Copilot launch was a disaster (251 points | 228 comments)
19. The Only Photo of the Concorde Flying at Supersonic Speed (35 points | 10 comments)
20. Show HN: A new native app for 20 year old OS X (64 points | 7 comments)
21. Two Bites of Data Science in K (15 points | 2 comments)
22. 100 years of Bell Labs [pdf] (53 points | 5 comments)
23. The impact of competition and DeepSeek on Nvidia (52 points | 18 comments)
24. Show HN: Orange intelligence, an open source alternative to Apple Intelligence (34 points | 5 comments)
25. OpenRA – Classic strategy games rebuilt for the modern era (582 points | 108 comments)
26. Render raises $80M in Series C financing (79 points | 78 comments)
27. AI slop, suspicion, and writing back (186 points | 149 comments)
28. Former tech CEO suing to get the record of his arrest removed from the internet (176 points | 122 comments)
29. Explainer: What's r1 and everything else? (217 points | 91 comments)
30. Every HTML Element (448 points | 126 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, January 26, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
